ack.p: The China Special Fund for Meteorological Research in the Public Interest (No. GYHY201506001-3) and Chinese Academy of Sciences ‘Strategic Priority Research Program-Climate Change: Carbon Budget and Relevant Issues’ [grant number XDA 05050408] joint supported this work. We thank Jun Chen, Liping Tan, Tao Liu, BingRui Jia, Yanling Jiang, Jian Song, Zhixiang Yang, Feng Zhang, Hui Wang, Yaohui Shi,Tianyu Hu, and Yanhui Hou for their help during the experiment.
